name: Jam Girl
description:
JAM GIRL was training peacefully to the sound of some sick beats when suddenly her body was moved by the mesmerizing ritm of her playlist going faster and faster, transporting to a place and a time she was not welcome, FUTURE CITY. In this new place she must JAM to the MAX to avoid the security system named METRO NOMUN and his hellish rain of bullets using her recently unlocked time powers.

Commands:

 WAD:  to move

SPACE: to reset her to past self

SHIFT:  to Shift in time and avoid damage (become invunerable)

Going easy is always an option, breath a little and take your time since you won't  take any damage, and remember to drink some water.

ENJOY :)

THEMES: Easy to play, hard to be good. Back to the future.

CREDITS:

LudEnsina - Gabryela Martins (Game Design), Murilo Mesquita (Programmer #1), Estêvão Vieira Vasconcelos (Programmer #2), Natan Nunes (Background Artist), Sarah Pancieri (Artist), Saulo Vieira Sousa (Sound Designer).
